title: Properties of light as it moves from air to water

content.question: When light passes from air into water, the frequency of the light remains the same. What happens to the speed and the wavelength of light as it crosses the boundary in going from air into water?

choices.label: Speed Wavelength Remains the same Decreases

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
